*div1 type="summary"* *p*Samuel M. Williams to James F. Perry, September 9, 1834. Austin's debts. Wonderful reaction in Austin's favor.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Sn Felipe*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="09-09-1834">9th Septemr 1834*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Mr James F Perry*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dear Sir. On my arrival here I found a *person_mentioned*Mr Bradley*/person_mentioned* here with a note of our friend *person_mentioned*Col Austin*/person_mentioned* for something upwards of 700$ which has been due some months, and which would have been paid ere this but from the necessity of providing funds for him in *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*After his arrest he wrote to me and requested me to dispose of his property to provide means for him, he has also sent you a letter of attorney for the same purpose. As yet I have not found it necessary to make any sale nor do I believe it will be necessary for I can continue to raise means for all his wants in *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned*, and he has authority to draw for another thousand dollars over and above what he has drawn for, and this note is the only one he has out—*/p*
*p*I find that at this place there is no money to be had at the moment. *person_mentioned*Mr White*/person_mentioned* at *location_mentioned*Columbia */location_mentioned*is likewise destitute if you have as much as 500$ by you I wish you would advance, it, and should you require it in the *date_mentioned n="Winter-1834">winter */date_mentioned*I can return it to you, and if you should want in *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned* I can manage to furnish it to you there, if you have it I should like to hear from you immediately—I can get along with the sum mentioned.*/p*
*p*I am happy to state that there is a wonderful reaction in favor of the *person_mentioned*Col.*/person_mentioned* and altho some what tardily I am proud in the Conviction that his *person_mentioned*Colonists */person_mentioned*are disposed to do him justice.*/p*
*p*Present me kindly to your family.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Samuel M. Williams*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*M A Bryan*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
